char_info.desc: The Cousin of the Phantasmal Percussionist

a0.speaker: Jeanne:
a0.dialogue: Oof... Are you just wanting me to let those innocent people burn in despair or not?

a1.speaker: Jeanne:
a1.dialogue: If not, why did you almost kill me with those knives?

a2.speaker: Jeanne:
a2.dialogue: Change your mind on both the person and my plans of negotiating with them.

a3.speaker: Jeanne:
a3.dialogue: Seriously. They really don't mean any harm and is truly a messiah.

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: With my apologies to you, I was a bit rash then.

a5.speaker: Sakuya:
a5.dialogue: If they are so nice and harmless, why not you invite them over for some tea, whether it is Darjeeling or Assam.
